meta.description: Optimize the number of blueberry and strawberry packs to minimize sugar intake while meeting anti-oxidant and mineral requirements.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits available for consumption.

params.name: anti_oxidants
params.description: Units of anti-oxidants per pack of each fruit.

params.name: minerals
params.description: Units of minerals per pack of each fruit.

params.name: sugar
params.description: Grams of sugar per pack of each fruit.

vars.name: packs
vars.description: Number of packs of each fruit to consume.

objective.name: min_total_sugar
objective.description: Minimize the total sugar intake from the packs of fruits.

constraints.name: anti_oxidant_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 90 units of anti-oxidants are consumed.

constraints.name: mineral_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 100 units of minerals are consumed.

constraints.name: strawberry_blueberry_ratio
constraints.description: Ensure at least 3 times as many packs of strawberries as blueberries are consumed.
